Double-breasted coat in a wool blend with wide notch lapels, gold-coloured buttons at the front and flap front pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Short sleeves with decorative, covered buttons at the top and a slit at the ends, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Chiffon lining.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Cable-knit jumper in a soft mohair and wool blend with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length lace dress with short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Coat in a woven wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric with an opening and visible buttons at the back and 3/4-length sleeves with flared cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and pleated sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and pleated sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Dress in crushed velvet with a V-neck and wrapover front. Gathered shoulders, long sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top.
Dress in crushed velvet with a V-neck and wrapover front. Gathered shoulders, long sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the top.
Pencil skirt in a stretch weave with decorative seams front and back and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a jacquard-weave with a burnout pattern and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Pleated skirt in patterned satin with visible elastic at the waist and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons. Concealed zip at the back.
Knee-length skirt with decorative buttons. Concealed zip at the back.

Polo-neck jumper in a soft, textured, cotton-blend knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short fitted dress in airy chiffon with a small stand-up collar and V-neck at the front. Deep V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and a tie at the neck. Gently flared skirt and long sleeves with wide cuffs with three covered buttons. Partial jersey lining.
Blouse in a textured cotton weave containing glittery threads with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft slub jersey with a draped front, deep armholes and racer back.
Vest top in soft slub jersey with a draped front, deep armholes and racer back.
Short fitted dress in glittery-patterned jersey with cut-out sections at the back and long sleeves.
Satin trousers with a high, pleated waist, side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs.
Short lace dress with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined in a contrasting colour.
Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal hair clips with a padded appliqué.
Non-wired lace bustier with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a seam under the bust.
Short dress in jersey with a lace back and long raglan sleeves. V-neck with an open section at the back, seam at the waist and gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Satin cardigan with 3/4-length sleeves, slits in the sides and no buttons. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Set with a shirt and slipover in cotton. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. Slipover in a textured knit with a V-neck.
Shorts in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Fake fly and decorative button at the waist.

Trenchcoat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish, notch lapels with decorative buttons, a loose yoke with a zip at the front, and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist , a tab and metal fastener at the cuffs, zipped side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Straight-cut coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels and a concealed double-breasted front. Diagonal front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Jacket in felted fabric containing some wool with a small stand-up collar and diagonal zip down the front. Side pockets and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.

Padded parka with a pile-lined hood with a tab and press-stud at the top. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets and flap patch pockets with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated, partially concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Padded parka with a pile-lined hood with a tab and press-stud at the top. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets and flap patch pockets with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated, partially concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Top in satin with lace details, narrow shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.

Long-sleeved cropped top in lace and mesh with a low-cut back with fasteners and an elasticated seam at the hem with a wide lace trim.
